subject: Golf
lead_paragraph: Rory McIlroy rallied to win the Hong Kong Open, holing out from a greenside bunker on the final hole for a five-under-par 65 and a two-stroke victory over Grégory Havret.
snippet: Rory McIlroy rallied to win the Hong Kong Open, holing out from a greenside bunker on the final hole for a five-under-par 65 and a two-stroke victory over Grégory Havret.
